cmu.edu.lti.bio.EntrezGeneWrapper
Class EntrezGeneWrapper

java.lang.Object
  cmu.edu.lti.bio.EntrezGeneWrapper.EntrezGeneWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapper, cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
public class EntrezGeneWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended

A class to wrap the functionality of Entrez Gene E-Utilities, primarily search and fetch. Search and fetch results are cached locally for faster retrieval over large datasets. See EntrezGeneExample for generic uses of this class.

Version:
0.2
Author:
Collin McCormack (cmccorma)
See Also:
ResourceWrapper, ResourceWrapperExtended

fetchXML

public org.w3c.dom.Document fetchXML(java.lang.String id)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Useful method for debugging Entrez Gene responses. Returns an XML DOM Document.

Parameters:
id - the Entrez Gene UID to fetch (String)
Returns:
XML Document
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query)
General query for Entrez Gene. Maximum of 10 Entity's are returned in an ArrayList. If the query returns no results, an empty ArrayList is returned. Additionally, it will return null if an IOException occurs.

Specified by:
getEntities in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
query - search terms
Returns:
An ArrayList containing matching Entity's (max 10 items)

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                               boolean exactMatch)
Overloaded version of getEntities that tests for an exact match (case-insensitive). Exact matching is done for name, synonyms, and type. Definition, relations, and ID are left out to prevent spurious matches. If an ID match is desired, use getEntitiesById.

Specified by:
getEntities in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
query - search terms
exactMatch - boolean flag for an exact match test on each result
Returns:
ArrayList of matching entities, empty if no results from search, null on error

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                               java.lang.String aType)
The same behavior as getEntities(query), but does an additional comparison against the type. Currently it's a 'dumb' comparison (exact match, not case-sensitive).

Specified by:
getEntities in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Parameters:
query - search terms
aType - type as String
Returns:
An ArrayList of matching Entity objects
See Also:
Entity

getEntityById

public cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id)
NOTE: This is method does not work very well for Entrez Gene default search, using getEntityById(id, exactMatch=true) is highly advised. Retrieves an Entity via the Entrez Gene web service. The first result of a search is returned. If there are no results, then null is returned.

Specified by:
getEntityById in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
id - String representing the id to search for, either a number or in the style of "AUTHORTIY:0001"
Returns:
An Entity, if no results then null

getEntityById

public cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity getEntityById(java.lang.String id,
                                                            boolean exactMatch)
Retrieves an Entity via the Entrez Gene web service. If exactMatch is true, then "id" is compared against retrieved ID's until a match is found. If no match is found, return null. If exactMatch is false, then the simpler getEntityById(String id) is called.

Specified by:
getEntityById in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapper
Parameters:
id - String representing the id to search for, either a number or in the style of "AUTHORTIY:0001"
exactMatch - boolean flag for an exact match test on each result
Returns:
An Entity matching the queried id, if no match then null

getRelatedEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity> getRelatedEntities(cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity eObj,
                                                                                      cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Relation relObj)
Not implemented for Entrez Gene. Enrez Gene is not a graph (or anything like one) and as such does not have easily searchable relationships.

Specified by:
getRelatedEntities in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Throws:
UnsupposrtedOperationException

getEntities

public java.util.ArrayList<cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.Entity> getEntities(java.lang.String query,
                                                                               cmu.edu.lti.bio.SpeciesMapper.Species species)
General query for Entrez Gene, species parameter is used to narrow results to only the species specified. Otherwise, behaves like getEntities(query)

Specified by:
getEntities in interface cmu.edu.lti.bio.ResourceWrapper.ResourceWrapperExtended
Parameters:
query - A String of query terms
species - A Species object, as is returned by SpeciesMapper
